subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The PPG will provide critical inputs to design the Full-Sized Project, including site selection, rapid assessment for knowledge and best practice demonstration, capacity assessment of key stakeholders, finalisation of institutional arrangements to support project implementation and legal and regulatory gap analysis and economic assessment.
subproject.title: Invasive Alien Species (PPG)

title: PPG on Project to Control Alien Invasive Species
